posts.post_content:
Cards are sold! Thank you.

Well loved, but priced to move. No secrets, the backs resemble the fronts. $60 bucks delivered takes the lot of all (9) cards. Payment via PayPal A-Okay with no added fee. Please email me if you like em'.

Thank you,
Tony
[url]andreatny@q.com[/url]
